meanings.definition: A band or molding around the top of an arch
meanings.sent1: The archivolt added elegance to the arch.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully designed the archivolt for the building.
meanings.sent3: The archivolt looked like a fancy ribbon on top of the arch.
meanings.sent4: The archivolt embraced the arch like a gentle hug.
meanings.sent5: The intricate archivolt stood out against the plain wall.

meanings.definition: A series of concentric moldings around an arch
meanings.sent1: The archivolt consisted of multiple layers of moldings.
meanings.sent2: The ancient archivolt showcased skilled craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The archivolt seemed like a stack of delicious pastries around the arch.
meanings.sent4: The archivolt encircled the arch like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The detailed archivolt captured the eye with its beauty.

meanings.definition: A decorative element in architecture consisting of a series of arches
meanings.sent1: The archivolt featured a row of miniature arches.
meanings.sent2: The colorful archivolt brightened up the building.
meanings.sent3: The archivolt looked like a row of smiling faces above the arch.
meanings.sent4: The archivolt danced gracefully along the arch.
meanings.sent5: The playful archivolt added a touch of whimsy to the architecture.
